name: PhiNesse Lashes Pen Growth Serum Eyeliner
short_description: The World's first 2 in 1 miraculous eyeliner with guaranteed lash growth serum formulated to give you fuller, longer eyelashes without any effort.
long_description: Clinically trialled this smudge proof, sweat proof, and water proof ink rich pen, glides on and sets quickly. The serum comes with a eyeliner-like, brush tip applicator that is easy maneuver, providing easy and effortless application. It contains essential ingredients that help restore and strengthen hair health to help short and dull lashes enhance naturally, getting fuller and stronger. Your lashes will seem healthy and conditioned, and will appear longer, fuller and thicker in only few weeks.It is dermatologist approved and safe for sensitive eyes.Scientific tests prove: The eyelash length in the active treated area was shown to increase by 9.2% compared to the basal value after 30 days of product use respectively.
